abstract: A new tool tracks the speed at which cloud services from Google, Microsoft and Amazon.com run, and then displays their worldwide performance.
snippet: A new tool tracks the speed at which cloud services from Google, Microsoft and Amazon.com run, and then displays their worldwide performance.
lead_paragraph: The cloud has been put on notice: It’s being watched.

headline.main: How Fast Can a Cloud Run?

abstract: Google said the search engine is now functioning normally in China after a “small blockage.”
snippet: Google said the search engine is now functioning normally in China after a “small blockage.”
lead_paragraph: Updated | July 31 2:40 p.m.:  Clarifying the source of the information about Google’s revenue in China.

headline.main: Google Search Engine Is Blocked in China
